attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current fireworks legislation is already draconian and if anything needs to be rolled back. It is almost possible that bursting a crisp packet has more effect than the emasculated pyro now permitted in the UK. Whilst there are legitimate concerns regarding use fireworks in the streets the answer is not further legislation but more effort from government to address the reasons for antisocial behaviour and illegal sales to minors.
